    • Constructor Detail

      • UDPThread

        public UDPThread(DatagramSocket datagramSocket,
                 DatagramPacket datagramPacket)
        Constructs a udp thread for processing data received and updating database, etc.
        Parameters:
        datagramSocket - a datagram socket that received a datagram packet.
        datagramPacket - a datagram packet that contains data sent by a client.
